contents: Thank you for contacting RH Electronics about (11) <u>your schools’ needs</u>. We would be happy to provide an estimate for interactive whiteboards. Most schools (12) <u>haven’t had no</u> experience with interactive whiteboards. They can greatly enhance the educational experience, but implementing this new technology can be challenging. Several large companies provide interactive whiteboards, and most of these products use proprietary software. We can help you compare the available (13) <u>educational tools and find,</u> the product that best suits your needs.
